hotels.name: Park Hyatt St. Kitts Christophe Harbour
hotels.desc: Luxury beachfront resort, championship golf course, world-class amenities
hotels.longDesc: An ultra-luxury resort nestled on a pristine beach with championship golf, perfect for families seeking upscale relaxation and premium service.
hotels.photoAttribution: Park Hyatt St. Kitts Christophe Harbour
hotels.address: Banana Bay South East Peninsula, St. Kitts, St Kitts & Nevis

hotels.name: Kittitian Hill Hotel
hotels.desc: Boutique plantation inn, lush gardens, farm-to-table dining, mountain views
hotels.longDesc: A charming plantation-style boutique hotel offering authentic Caribbean hospitality with farm-fresh cuisine and serene garden settings for a memorable family escape.

hotels.name: Nisbet Plantation Beach Club
hotels.desc: All-inclusive beachfront resort, coconut plantation grounds, water sports included
hotels.longDesc: An all-inclusive beachfront resort on historic plantation grounds with included water sports and activities, ideal for families seeking worry-free Caribbean vacation time.

hotels.name: Ottley's Plantation Inn
hotels.desc: Historic sugar plantation hotel, scenic gardens, authentic Caribbean charm
hotels.longDesc: A charming historic plantation estate converted into an intimate inn with lush gardens and authentic Caribbean experiences perfect for culturally curious families.

restaurants.name: Carambola Beach Club
restaurants.desc: Fine dining Caribbean cuisine, sunset views, locally-sourced ingredients
restaurants.longDesc: An elegant fine dining restaurant showcasing modern Caribbean cuisine with sunset ocean views, offering a sophisticated yet family-welcoming dining experience.

restaurants.name: Spice Mill Restaurant
restaurants.desc: Casual Caribbean fare, beachfront setting, fresh seafood daily specials
restaurants.longDesc: A relaxed beachfront restaurant serving authentic Caribbean flavors and fresh daily seafood catches in a family-friendly, casual island atmosphere.

restaurants.name: Pepperpot Restaurant
restaurants.desc: Traditional Kittitian cuisine, local recipes, authentic island cooking
restaurants.longDesc: A beloved local restaurant serving traditional Kittitian dishes and authentic island recipes, offering genuine Caribbean flavors families can enjoy together.
restaurants.address: Rodney Heights, Rodney Bay, St Lucia

restaurants.name: Cafe Des Arts
restaurants.desc: Cozy cafe, fresh coffee, pastries, light lunch options
restaurants.longDesc: A charming cafe perfect for morning coffee and pastries, offering a relaxed spot for families to grab quick, delicious refreshments throughout the day.

restaurants.name: Marshall's
restaurants.desc: Local Caribbean cuisine near Brimstone Hill with kid-friendly menu
restaurants.address: Fort Tyson, Frigate Bay, St Kitts & Nevis

restaurants.name: Aqua Ballahoo Restaurant
restaurants.desc: Waterfront restaurant in Basseterre with Caribbean classics and ocean views
restaurants.address: 586 Fort St, Basseterre, St Kitts & Nevis

restaurants.name: Coconut Grove Cafe - Bar - Pizzeria
restaurants.desc: Beachfront dining at Nisbet with fresh seafood and Caribbean flavors
restaurants.address: Island Paradise Zenway Blvd Frigate Bay St Kitts St. Kitts, Frigate Bay, St Kitts & Nevis

restaurants.name: Sunshine's Beach Bar & Grill
restaurants.desc: Famous beachfront bar on Pinneys serving grilled lobster and killer bee cocktails
restaurants.address: Pinneys Beach, Nevis, St Kitts & Nevis

restaurants.name: Bananas Restaurant
restaurants.desc: Elegant beachfront dining at Four Seasons with Caribbean-inspired cuisine

restaurants.name: Barefoot Beach Bar
restaurants.desc: Casual beachfront lunch at hotel with fresh salads and grilled fish

restaurants.name: The Pavilion | Christophe Harbour
restaurants.desc: Farm-to-table Caribbean cuisine at Kittitian Hill with stunning mountain views

restaurants.name: Shipwreck Beach Bar
restaurants.desc: Casual beachside lunch spot on Pinneys Beach with kid-friendly menu

restaurants.name: Serendipity Restaurant
restaurants.desc: Casual beachside restaurant with Caribbean fusion and sunset views
restaurants.address: 3 Wigley Ave, Basseterre, St Kitts & Nevis

experiences.name: Belmont Farm
experiences.desc: Historic volcanic farm, agricultural tours, scenic mountain views, authentic island experience
experiences.longDesc: A distinctive farm experience set on the slopes of a volcano in Saint Kitts, offering visitors authentic agricultural activities and stunning natural scenery.
experiences.address: The Village Kittitian Hill St. Kitts, St Kitts & Nevis

experiences.name: Brimstone Hill Fortress National Park
experiences.desc: Historic fortress, panoramic views, interactive exhibits, UNESCO heritage site
experiences.longDesc: An iconic mountaintop fortress with stunning panoramic views and rich colonial history, offering educational and scenic exploration perfect for curious families.
experiences.address: Island Main Road, Sandy Point Town, St Kitts & Nevis

experiences.name: Sky Safari Zipline
experiences.desc: Zip-line adventure through rainforest canopy, wildlife viewing, thrilling experience
experiences.longDesc: An exhilarating zip-line canopy tour through lush rainforest with wildlife spotting and thrilling views, creating unforgettable adventure memories for active families.
experiences.address: 85GX+XMX, Unnamed Road, Old Road Town, St Kitts & Nevis

experiences.name: Nevis Peak
experiences.desc: Mountain hiking trail, volcanic crater views, lush tropical scenery
experiences.longDesc: A scenic hiking trail leading to volcanic crater views with lush tropical forests, offering rewarding nature exploration and unforgettable island vistas for families.

experiences.name: Museum of Nevis History
experiences.desc: Colonial artifacts, island heritage exhibits, educational cultural experience
experiences.longDesc: An engaging museum showcasing Nevis's fascinating colonial history and island heritage through artifacts and displays, ideal for culturally curious family learning.

experiences.name: Oualie Beach Resort
experiences.desc: Beach resort and restaurant on Oualie Beach with water sports and dining facilities
experiences.address: Oualie Beach, Oualie Bay, Nevis, New Castle, St Kitts & Nevis

experiences.name: Lovers Beach
experiences.desc: Secluded beach on the north side of Nevis with calm waters and pristine sand

kidFriendly.name: Pinneys beach
kidFriendly.desc: Long sandy beach, calm waters, perfect for swimming and sandcastle building
kidFriendly.longDesc: A beautiful long sandy beach with calm, shallow waters ideal for young children to swim and play safely while families enjoy pristine Caribbean beach days.

kidFriendly.name: South Friars Bay
kidFriendly.desc: Family-friendly beach with calm waters and beach bar
kidFriendly.address: South Friars Bay, St Kitts & Nevis

markets.name: Basseterre Market
markets.desc: Local produce, spices, crafts, authentic Caribbean market experience
markets.longDesc: A vibrant local market brimming with fresh tropical produce, spices, and handmade crafts where families discover authentic island flavors and cultural treasures.

a.name: Island Time with Little Ones (7 Days)
a.description: A perfectly paced Caribbean escape balancing beach adventures, historical discovery, and plenty of downtime for napping toddlers and sandcastle architects.
